Completion Prompts: Identify a current conflict where power dynamics need attention.
Reflect on a past conflict: How did power influence the outcome?
Consider a future conflict: How can you ensure equitable voice?

Overall Outcomes.Excellent: Power dynamics are skillfully navigated, fostering equitable resolutions and strengthened relationships.
Overall Outcomes.Expected: Power is acknowledged but not effectively managed, resulting in partial resolutions and lingering tensions.
Overall Outcomes.Poor: Power dynamics are ignored, leading to unresolved conflicts and entrenched inequities.
Overall Outcomes.Transcendent: Power navigation becomes intuitive, creating a culture of fairness and mutual respect in conflicts.

Overall Purpose: To understand and manage power dynamics in conflicts, ensuring equitable resolutions and fostering trust within the system.

Guiding Questions: What power structures are influencing this conflict?
Who holds power, and how is it being used?
How can we address power imbalances?
Themes.Name: Recognizing Power Dynamics

Excellent.Future effect: The future sustains fair and collaborative environments.
Excellent.Present pattern: Power dynamics are actively explored and understood.
Excellent.Signals: Open discussions about power, equitable solutions.

Expected.Example moves: Noting power dynamics but not addressing them.
Expected.Present pattern: Power is acknowledged but not fully understood.

Poor.Future effect: The future inherits entrenched conflicts and inequities.
Poor.Present pattern: Power dynamics are overlooked or denied.

Transcendent.30-90 day system effect: Conflicts are resolved with fairness and respect.
Transcendent.Edge condition: Avoiding overemphasis on power at the expense of resolution.
Transcendent.Example moves: Integrating power dynamics into conflict resolution protocols.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives in a culture of equity and mutual respect.
Transcendent.Present pattern: Power awareness is embedded in the culture.

Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To identify and understand the power structures influencing the conflict.
Themes.Why This Matters: Awareness of power dynamics is crucial for addressing imbalances and achieving fair outcomes.

Guiding Questions: Whose voices are missing in this discussion?
How can we ensure all perspectives are heard?
Themes.Name: Balancing Power and Voice

Excellent.Example moves: Using facilitation techniques to balance participation.
Excellent.Future effect: The future benefits from inclusive and innovative solutions.
Excellent.Present pattern: All voices are actively encouraged and balanced.

Expected.Example moves: Inviting input but not ensuring it is heard.
Expected.Immediate cost: Some perspectives are considered, others overlooked.
Expected.Present pattern: Efforts are made to include all voices, but inconsistently.

Poor.Example moves: Allowing dominant voices to control discussions.
Poor.Future effect: The future suffers from limited perspectives and solutions.
Poor.Signals: Frequent interruptions, lack of diverse input.

Transcendent.30-90 day system effect: Conflicts are resolved with comprehensive input.
Transcendent.Example moves: Embedding voice equity in all conflict protocols.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on diversity and shared power.
Transcendent.Present pattern: Equitable voice is a cultural norm.

Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To ensure all voices are heard and power is balanced in conflict resolution.
Themes.Why This Matters: Equitable voice ensures diverse perspectives are considered, leading to fairer outcomes.

Guiding Questions: What does an equitable resolution look like here?
How can we ensure all parties feel respected?
What steps can we take to balance power in resolutions?
Themes.Name: Facilitating Equitable Resolutions

Excellent.Future effect: The future sustains harmonious and equitable relationships.
Excellent.Present pattern: Resolutions are crafted with equity and respect.

Expected.Example moves: Seeking quick resolutions without full input.
Expected.Immediate cost: Some parties feel unheard or disadvantaged.
Expected.Present pattern: Resolutions attempt fairness but fall short.

Poor.Example moves: Accepting resolutions that benefit only the dominant party.

Transcendent.30-90 day system effect: Conflicts are resolved with mutual respect and understanding.
Transcendent.Example moves: Integrating equity principles into all resolution processes.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on fairness and collaborative growth.
Transcendent.Present pattern: Equitable resolution is an ingrained practice.
Transcendent.Signals: Consistent satisfaction and trust in outcomes.

Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To guide conflicts towards resolutions that respect all parties and balance power.
Themes.Why This Matters: Equitable resolutions build trust and prevent future conflicts.

Guiding Questions: How can we build trust during this conflict?
How can we repair trust if it’s broken?
Themes.Name: Building Trust in Conflict

Excellent.Future effect: The future sustains robust, trusting collaborations.
Excellent.Present pattern: Trust is actively cultivated throughout conflicts.

Expected.Future effect: The future experiences fluctuating trust levels.
Expected.Immediate cost: Mixed levels of openness and cooperation.
Expected.Present pattern: Trust is considered but not consistently built.
Expected.Signals: Varying degrees of defensiveness and cooperation.

Poor.Example moves: Focusing solely on outcomes, not process.
Poor.Future effect: The future is marked by distrust and isolation.

Transcendent.30-90 day system effect: Conflicts are resolved with deep mutual understanding.
Transcendent.Example moves: Embedding trust principles in all conflict processes.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on enduring trust and cooperation.
Transcendent.Present pattern: Trust-building is integral to conflict culture.

Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To foster trust throughout the conflict resolution process.
Themes.Why This Matters: Trust is the foundation of effective conflict resolution and long-term collaboration.

Guiding Questions: What have we learned from past conflicts?
How can we apply these lessons to future conflicts?
What patterns in power dynamics have emerged?
Themes.Name: Reflecting on Power and Conflict

Excellent.Future effect: The future evolves with informed, adaptive practices.
Excellent.Present pattern: Regular reflection on conflicts and power dynamics.

Expected.Edge condition: Assuming reflection is a one-time event.
Expected.Future effect: The future benefits unevenly from past experiences.

Transcendent.Example moves: Integrating reflection into all conflict protocols.
Transcendent.Future effect: The future thrives on continuous learning and evolution.
Transcendent.Present pattern: Reflection is embedded in the conflict culture.

Themes.Purpose of This Theme: To reflect on past conflicts and power dynamics to inform future actions.
Themes.Why This Matters: Reflection allows for learning and growth, preventing repeated mistakes and fostering improvement.

Title: Navigating Power in Conflict
When To Use This Protocol: Use during conflicts where power imbalances are evident, when past conflicts have led to unresolved tensions, or when striving for equitable solutions.
Why This Matters: Unchecked power dynamics can exacerbate conflicts, leading to inequitable outcomes and eroded trust. Navigating power thoughtfully promotes fairness and collaboration.
